text: Fotis Kezos (born July 25, 1995) is a Cypriot-Greek professional footballer who plays as a centre back for Aris Limassol FC. He can also play as a Defensive midfielder.https://www.eurosport.com/football/fotis- kezos_prs433033/person.shtml> ==Career== He started his career at AEK Athens academy, before graduating to the first team. He followed this up with spells at Othellos Athienou and Nea Salamis before joining Ermis Aradippou. On 4 July 2017, Kezos joined Leeds United, where he would link up with former Ermis manager Carlos Corberán, who is the head coach of the Under 23's side, with the player revealing the move on his Instagram. On 8 January 2019, Digenis Oroklinis announced the signing of Kezos.Ο Φώτης Κέζος στο Διγενή, digenisvoroklinisfc.com, 8 January 2019 In September 2019, he signed with Aris Limassol FC.Προβάρει τα πράσινα ο Κέζος, balla.com.cy, 9 September 2019Ήττα του ΑΣΙΛ στην Λεμεσό από τον Άρη, larnakasports.com, 1 November 2019 ==International career== Kezos has represented Cyprus U-17 and Cyprus U-19's at international level. ==Honours== ;AEK Athens *Football League 2: 2013–14 (6th Group) ==References== ==External links== * http://backend.cfa.com.cy/Gr/players/2196795/180025 * https://www.sofascore.com/player/fotis-kezos/186739 * https://www.whoscored.com/Players/245881/Show/Fotis-Kezos Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Cypriot footballers Category:Greek footballers Category:AEK Athens F.C. players Category:Othellos Athienou F.C. players Category:Nea Salamis Famagusta FC players Category:Ermis Aradippou FC players Category:Trikala F.C. players Category:Digenis Oroklinis players Category:Aris Limassol FC players Category:Cypriot Second Division players Category:Gamma Ethniki players Category:Association football central defenders
